fixes.name: Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs
fixes.dax_expression: ABS( SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)]) )
fixes.solution_explanation: Implements the Tableau calculated field abs(SUM([Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)])) as a DAX measure using ABS and SUM.

fixes.name: BATCH
fixes.dax_expression:
DIVIDE(
    [Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs],
    CALCULATE(
        [Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs],
        ALL('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)')
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converts Tableau TOTAL(...) table calculation to a DAX measure by dividing the measure by its full-table total using CALCULATE with ALL to remove filters, matching the TOTAL behavior.
